messages.subject: Special Request for HIghland Park Homeschoolers
messages.msgSnippet:
My daughter is doing a paper for her anthropology class on homeschooling,
and she would like to speak with homeschooled children and their parents.
She wants
messages.messageBody:
My daughter is doing a paper for her anthropology class on homeschooling,
and she would like to speak with homeschooled children and their parents.
She wants to speak with a wide range of people, unschool, home at school,
Jewish, non-Jewish etc. etc. so I would appreciate it if you forwarded this
other groups you are on. She wishes to speak to only those who are in the
Highland park area. (Where she can get to!) Please write, and have them
write to me at:

hindar@..., with the words HOMESCHOOL/HIGHLAND PARK in the subject
area....
giving me some contact information (email, phone number etc.) that I can
pass on to my daughter, as she will be contacting people directly....

Thank you so much!!







[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
